snippet: The officer, William Masso, was accused of leading a group of officers who accepted thousands of dollars to bring weapons into the state.
abstract: New York Police Officer William Masso pleads guilty to leading group of officers who accepted thousands of dollars in cash in return for illegally transporting firearms into the state.
lead_paragraph: The officer, William Masso, was accused of leading a group of officers who accepted thousands of dollars to bring weapons into the state.

headline.seo: New York Officer Pleads Guilty in Gun-Smuggling Case
headline.main: City Officer Pleads Guilty in Gun-Smuggling Case
headline.print_headline: City Officer Pleads Guilty In Gun-Smuggling Case
